text:
VentureDive | Karachi, Pakistan | iOS developer + 3d Generalist | Full Time | Remote

VentureDive is the tech company that has built multiple unicorns - including Careem (Uber of Middle East) and Vistajet (private jet service).

I've come onboard to build the XR division. Looking to create innovate AR/ VR/ MR products for global clients.

I'm building a team of rockstars from around the globe. Currently working with folks from Netherlands, London and Massachusetts.

If you're passionate about XR and would like to make a dent in the universe - lets talk! Hit me up: m.shariq@venturedive.com
